But behind that mantra lies a vast network of corporate lobbying and political action aimed to increase corporate profits at public expense without public knowledge.

Using interviews, documents, and field reporting, the episode explores ALECÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s self-serving machine at work, acting in a way one Wisconsin politician describes as Ã¢â‚¬Å“a corporate dating service for lonely legislators and corporate special interests.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
